game.name: The Crown of Leaves
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roui, a resilient city dandy, a half-educated jeweler and the author of scientific magic articles, was met with a colossal failure and must return to his homeland Latori.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roui, a resilient city dandy, a half-educated jeweler and the author of scientific magic articles, was met with a colossal failure and must return to his homeland Latori.

reviewHighlights.text: Far exceeded my expectations as far as visual novels go, despite the final chapter not being out. Chapter 2 was engrossing, between the gorgeous visua...
